info.title: HealthHub API
info.description: Victory is coming very soon ðŸ™‚

token.description: Authentication token for the registered user

post.summary: Check the presence of an email in the database

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body or ID)

post.summary: Add food intake for a meal type

put.summary: Update food intake for a specific product

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the food product to update

post.summary: Add Water intake for a user

get.description: Retrieve a list of recommended food items.

200.description: Successful request. Returns a list of recommended food items.

500.description: Server error. Unable to retrieve food recommendations.

WaterIntakeRequest.description: Data for updating information about water intake.

calories.description: Amount of calories in the food product

carbohydrates.description: Amount of carbohydrates in the food product

protein.description: Amount of protein in the food product

fat.description: Amount of fat in the food product

EmailCheckRequest.description: Send a new password to the user's email if it exists in the database.

message.description: A message indicating whether the email exists in the database or not.

EmailCheckResponse.description: Response indicating if the email exists in the database.

UpdateUserInfoRequest.description: Data for updating information about a user.

height.description: The user's updated height in centimeters.

weight.description: The user's updated weight in kilograms.

FoodIntakeUpdateRequest.description: Data for updating information about food intake.

FoodIntakeRequest.description: Request to add food intake information for a user.

FoodIntakeResponse.description: Response after successfully adding food intake information for a user.

message.description: A message indicating whether the password reset email was sent successfully or not.

ForgotPasswordResponse.description: Response indicating if the password reset email was sent.
